article_caption: The Wright brothers' first flight in 1903

article_paragraphs.text: Wilbur and Orville Wright were brothers from America. They owned a bicycle shop, but they had a much bigger dream. They wanted to fly. Many people thought it was impossible for humans to fly like birds, but the brothers did not give up. They wanted to invent a flying machine.

The brothers watched birds carefully. They saw how birds used their wings to balance in the wind. Wilbur and Orville built many gliders to test their ideas. They did many experiments to find the best shape for the wings. Finally, they built a plane with a small engine.

On December 17, 1903, the brothers were ready. Orville became the first pilot. The plane flew for 12 seconds and traveled about 36 meters. It was a short flight, but it was a great success. The Wright brothers became famous because they changed the world forever.
